description.en:
Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day, he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him...?

She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than most adults.
A dramatic story woven between a professional child actress and her manager!

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

description.en: In the year 2045 A.D., Earth is invaded by four different worlds. To defend the planet, one must conquer the dungeons connected to each of these other worlds. Each country selects 'explorers' to take on this task, and Gunma, an ordinary man chosen in Japan, is suddenly thrown into the front lines of the attack! Scared and over-equipped, he activates his 'listening ear' and 'enemy searching' skills. Then, he encounters the strongest and most beautiful girl in all of mankind! While being pushed around by the girl, who is too strong for her own good but has a tofu mentality, he rushes through the dungeon at breakneck speed... This is an unprecedented dungeon fantasy that loosely knocks down everything!

title.en: Attacking the Girls' Dormitory of the Demon King

description.en: A female assassin from the modern era transmigrates into a cheesy Western-themed fantasy otome game and needs to make the Demonic male leads fall in love with her in order to save the world. Bent on returning to reality, she begins to train the assassination skills of the evil second female lead, Lisa, in the hope that Lisa will kill her, but because of her stubbornly silly personality and various types of ambiguous physical contact, she made Lisa fall in love with her?

description.vi: Tiếp tục là manga của D4DJ về Peaky P-key, unit đỉnh nhất của học viện Yoba còn gọi là nhà vô địch tuyệt đối. Sáng tác bởi Ichiro Sakaki, minh họa bởi Mitsuki Meia, manga kể về màn gặp gỡ giữa Kyoko và Shinobu, và sự hình thành của Peaky P-key với sự tham gia của Yuka và Esora.

altTitles.en: A Tale Of Adventure About Of Pouring 25 Years Of Life Into A Useless Skill, And Now, It Being The Strongest

description.en:
A skill useless from the beginning, <Restoration>. Regardless, in order to save a childhood friend who sacrificed her body to protect him, Touru spent twenty-five years developing the skill. Once completed, the skill could completely defy the world’s common sense. Touru, the girl, the naughty child they picked up in a back alley, and the old landlord lady join together as companions, setting out on an adventure to become heroes. A man who lived through the depths of despair decided to move forward and widen his horizons.

Alternative Description (ComicWalker):  
Touru's childhood friend Sora was attacked by a monster, and was suspended in a state of near death. The only way to save her was to raise his skill <Restoration>. However, even at low levels, it's a struggle against mere goblin opponents. Now, 25 years have passed. But after all his efforts and hard work, Touru's hand now holds a versatile skill that can "Freely Restore the Subject to it's Past State"! Originally forged from his masterful instincts and past experiences, he furthermore got the strongest skill. And now finally he makes his name known in the world!
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172)
description.ja:
Alternative Raw: [NicoNico Seiga](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/42124)  
Japanese Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/191792/)  
Japanese Web Novel: [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1850ew/)
description.ru: Этот навык был бесполезен с самого начала. Но несмотря на это, ради спасения подруги детства, которая пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы защитить его, Тору потратил 25 лет, развивая этот навык. А когда он закончил, навык мог полностью игнорировать здравый смысл мира. Тору, девушка, непослушный ребёнок, которого они подобрали на задворках, и старая леди-домовладелица объединяются в команду, отправившись в приключение, чтобы стать героями. Человек, который прошёл через глубины отчаяния, решил идти вперёд, чтобы расширить свой кругозор.

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

description.en: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

altTitles.ja: となりの黒川さん
My Neighbor Ms.Kurokawa

altTitles.en: My Neighbor Ms. Kurokawa
Kurokawa-san Next To Me

description.en:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret. 

This awkward duo weaves a sweet and tangy youth romantic comedy that will make you grin!
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼

altTitles.en: Life as a Reincarnated Sage in Another World: Gaining a Second Profession and Becoming the Strongest in the World

description.en:
Sano Yuji, a black company employee, is summoned to another world while finishing his work at home. His profession in the other world, a Monster Tamer, is considered a job that makes it difficult to become an adventurer. However, thanks to some slimes he met, which read several magical books, he gained magical powers and the second profession, Sage.
Yuji acquired overwhelming power, but is he conscious of his strength? Blindly becoming unparalleled and strongest in the world!
description.fr:
Yuji Sano, employé d'une "entreprise noire", est invoqué vers un autre alors qu'il était en train de travailler chez lui.
Dans ce nouveau monde, il obtient la profession de "dresseur" de monstre, une profession qui rend le travail d'aventurier difficile. Cependant, grâce aux nombreux Slimes qu'il a dressés, il obtient une seconde profession, celle de "Sage", après qu'ils aient lu de nombreux livres magiques pour lui.  
Yuji a alors acquis un immense pouvoir dont il ne semble pas être conscient. Insoucieusement, il est en voie de devenir le plus puissant être de ce monde!
description.ja:
ブラック企業の社畜・佐野ユージはPC作業中に異世界に召喚! 異世界での彼の職業、それは『魔物使い(テイマー)』。冒険者になることも難しいとされる不遇職。
しかし、仲間にしたスライムのおかげで大量の魔導書を読み、様々な魔法の力を手にし、第二の職業『賢者』を手に入れる!
圧倒的な力を得たユージだが、自分の強さには無自覚で…?
最強の力で無自覚無双!「小説家になろう」発! 大人気異世界最強ファンタジーをコミカライズ!!
description.ru: Сотрудник «чёрной» компании Сано Юдзи оказался призван в другой мир как раз когда заканчивал свою работу дома. Там он получил профессию Укротитель монстров, считающуюся у местных неудобной для становления авантюристом. но благодаря знакомству со слизнями, которые прочитали несколько магических книг, он обрел магическую силу и вторую профессию — Мудрец. Вот так Юдзи встал на путь, который сделает его непревзойденным и сильнейшим в мире!

altTitles.ja: 転生ゴブリンだけど質問ある？

altTitles.en: So What's Wrong with Getting Reborn as a Goblin?

altTitles.zh: 转世哥布林乐队你有什么问题吗?

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉世哥布林樂隊你有什麽問題嗎?

altTitles.en: I'm a Reincarnated Goblin, Any Questions?

altTitles.es: Soy un Goblin Reencarnado, ¿Alguna Otra Pregunta?

description.en: An ordinary office worker should have died in a traffic accident, but when he awoke he became a goblin. Goblins have a lifespan of only seven days. However, the hero who has been given the skill "Human 80 years" takes advantage of his longevity and takes over the skills of many goblins and even the demon king who is on the verge of destined life, and stands out in a different world. Weakest Race x Strongest Skill = The strongest fantasy is incomparable!
description.es: Un empleado de oficina común debería haber muerto en un accidente de tránsito, pero cuando despertó se convirtió en un Goblin. Sin embargo, el protagonista al que se le ha dado la habilidad "Humano 80 años" aprovecha al máximo su longevidad, se hace cargo de las habilidades de muchos duendes, e incluso del demonio que está al borde de la vida destinada, y se destaca en un mundo diferente. Raza más débil x Habilidad más fuerte = ¡La fantasía de Musou más fuerte!

altTitles.ja: 化物語

description.en:
Koyomi Araragi, a third-year high school student, manages to survive a vampire attack with the help of Meme Oshino, a strange man residing in an abandoned building. Though being saved from vampirism and now a human again, several side effects such as superhuman healing abilities and enhanced vision still remain. Regardless, Araragi tries to live the life of a normal student, with the help of his friend and the class president, Tsubasa Hanekawa. When fellow classmate Hitagi Senjougahara falls down the stairs and is caught by Araragi, the boy realizes that the girl is unnaturally weightless. Despite Senjougahara's protests, Araragi insists he help her, deciding to enlist the aid of Oshino, the very man who had once helped him with his own predicament. Through several tales involving demons and gods, Bakemonogatari follows Araragi as he attempts to help those who suffer from supernatural maladies.

[INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2219-bakemonogatari?utm_source=mgd)
description.ru: Арараги Коёми — с виду самый обычный школьник — однажды поднимался по лестнице. Неожиданно на него сверху падает его одноклассница, Хитаги Сэндзёгахара — молчаливая и нелюдимая. Уже было подставив руки, паренек приготовился упасть вместе с девушкой, но та оказалась не тяжелее школьного учебника… Через какое-то время Коёми понял: несмотря на образ, который сложился за долгое время, Сэндзёгахара молчит совсем не из-за скромности! Больно крутой и дерзкий характер у нее оказался. А ещё она легко и быстро достает буквально из воздуха острые предметы — школьные канцтовары. Но и сам Арараги оказался не слишком прост. Он рассказал, что сам до недавнего времени был вампиром, и выручил его один знакомый — Мэмэ Ошино. Не поймешь, святой или просто старый хиппи… Он объяснил: над Хитаги кто-то подшутил. И этот кто-то — бог. Ну, а что делать обычному герою? Помогать девушкам в беде, конечно же! А их таких о-очень много…
description.pt-br: Koyomi Araragi, um estudante do terceiro ano, que é quase humano novamente depois de se tornar por um breve período um vampiro. Um dia, uma colega de classe chamada Hitagi Senjogahara, que vergonhosamente nunca fala com ninguém, cai da escada nos braços de Koyomi. Ele descobre que Hitagi não possui peso nenhum, um desafio a física. Apesar de ter sido ameaçado por ela, Koyomi oferece sua ajuda, e apresenta a Meme Oshino, um homem sem-teto de meia-idade que o ajudou a deixar de ser um vampiro.

altTitles.ja: 行き遅れ聖女の幸せ
行き遅れ聖女の幸せ～婚約破棄されたと思ったら魔族の皇子様に溺愛されてます！～

The Saint's Belated Happiness: Newly Single, Now Living with the Demon Prince
The Happiness of the Old Miss Saint

description.en:
“Huh? You’re already 27 years old”. 

The Saint Marialite’s engagement with the crown prince was called off because of her age! Due to various circumstances, the level-headed Marialite acknowledges this and returns to her hometown. However, she encounters a child raised in secret…? What's more, after growing up in a short amount of time, he falls for Marialite, and wants to take her back to his own country!

A romantic fantasy story about a level-headed saint who gets dumped for being in her late twenties and ends up living with the demon prince instead!

The adored fantasy's long awaited serialization!

---

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**  

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3289ds/)

description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

description.en: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

altTitles.ja-ro: Poe no Ichizoku

altTitles.ja: ポーの一族

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Around 1880, the Baron de Portsnell and his family visited a seaside town. They had come from London, and they soon became well known in the city. The baron and his wife and their children, Edgar and Marybelle, exuded an elegance that was out of place in a country town.

The sight of them was like looking at a perfect painting. In fact, their beauty was a magical beauty out of time. They were the "Poe's Clan", vampirnellas who consume human blood. The family rented a house on the outskirts of the city and began to search for someone to welcome into the clan, pretending to be human. 

Edgar was intrigued by Alan Twilight, the son of the city's foremost trader....

[Official English](https://www.fantagraphics.com/products/the-poe-clan-vol-1?_pos=1&_sid=27aa05edc&_ss=r)

---
- **Won the 21st Shogakukan Manga Award for Shojo in 1976, which it shared with Hagio's other serial, They Were Eleven**

title.en: Isekai Furin ll ~Michibika Reshi Hitodzuma Tachi to Bukiyo Tensei Yuusha~

altTitles.ja: 異世界不倫Ⅱ～導かれし人妻たちと不器用転生勇者～

altTitles.en: Otherworld Affair II
Isekai Affair 2
Isekai Furin Part 2

description.en:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
description.id: Suami sibuk bekerja Istri sibuk selingkuh, Seorang pekerja kantoran, Yuuto Aida, menyaksikan perselingkuhan istrinya di rumahnya! Ketika dia melompat keluar rumah, dia ditabrak truk dan bereinkarnasi di dunia lain sebagai pahlawan!! Namun, karena kesalahpahaman tentang Reinkarnasi Dewi, dia hanya punya satu skill, itu adalah skill yang dapat memikat istri orang lain!!
description.ja: ごくごく普通のサラリーマン・愛田勇人（あいだ　ゆうと）は、自宅で妻の浮気現場を目撃！家を飛び出したところ、“例のトラック”に轢かれ──勇者として異世界転生することに！！しかし、転生の女神のひょんな勘違いから、たったひとつのスキルだけを彼は手に入れることになった──　それは、“人妻完全魅了（チャーム）”というスキル！世の人妻は皆すべて、彼に魅了される！！！！

altTitles.ja-ro: Oukoku e Tsuzuku Michi Dorei Kenshi no Nariagari Harem Life

altTitles.en: Road to the Kingdom Slave Swordsman the Rise of Heroes - Harem Life

altTitles.ja: 王国へ続く道 奴隷剣士の成り上がり英雄譚（ハーレムライフ）

description.en:
This is the story of a young slave gladiator in an underground arena. He doesn’t know about his past or how he got to where he is, only that his name is Aegir, and that he is strong.  
  
One day he kills the boss and escapes the arena, joining a band of mercenaries as a new recruit. During one mission, they encounter the vampire, Lucy, who slaughters the band with her inhuman strength. After learning that Aegir only knows how to kill, Lucy lets him stay at her house, educating and taking care of him.  
  
Two years pass, and on the day of Aegir’s departure, they both exchange a promise that if Aegir becomes a king and owns the land of Erg forest, he can come and take her as his woman. Making this his life goal, Aegir set out on a journey to become a hero, a king, and found his own kingdom.
description.ru:
Это история о молодом рабе-гладиаторе на подземной арене. Он не знает ни о своем прошлом, ни о том, как он попал туда, где находится, знает только, что его зовут Эгир и что он силен.

Однажды он убивает босса и убегает с арены, присоединившись к банде наемников в качестве нового рекрута. Во время одной миссии они сталкиваются с вампиром Люси, который убивает группу с ее нечеловеческой силой. Узнав, что Эгир умеет только убивать, Люси позволяет ему оставаться в ее доме, обучая и заботясь о нем.

Прошло два года, и в день отъезда Эгира они оба обменялись обещанием, что если Эгир станет королем и будет владеть землей леса Эрг, он сможет прийти и взять ее в жены. Сделав это своей жизненной целью, Эгир отправился в путешествие, чтобы стать героем, королем и найти свое собственное королевство.

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Exorcist wo Otosenai

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

altTitles.en: My Cat Is Waiting For Me!
My Kitten♂ Is Waiting, So I'm Going Home.

altTitles.ja: 子猫♂が待ってるので帰ります。

description.en:
Miyako is stressed out at work. Seeking solace, she tries to get a cat, but is unable to do so. She returns home dejected… only to find a child with cat ears and a hoodie lying on the floor…! When she rushes to take care of him, she finds out that he is a very beautiful boy!

The cute and dangerous life together of a beautiful boy and an office worker begins!

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

description.en:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

This is an unusual romantic comedy for those of you who have things you can't tell others!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

description.en:
As a member of the hero's party, Arga hid his identity and was on a journey to subjugate the Demon King with the hero. At last the party chased the demon king, and Arga brought him down. However, the hero insists that he was the one who killed the Demon King, and then charges Arga with an innocent sin and banishes him from the Imperial Palace. The warrior who devoted his life to the hero as a part of his corp would walk a new life in a strange country town.

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6658ej/)
description.pt-br: Como membro do partido do herói, Arga escondeu sua identidade e estava em uma jornada para subjugar o Rei Demônio com o herói. Por fim, o grupo perseguiu o rei demônio e Arga o derrubou. No entanto, o herói insiste que ele foi quem matou o Rei Demônio, e depois acusa Arga de um pecado inocente e o expulsa do Palácio Imperial. O guerreiro que dedicou sua vida ao herói como parte de seu corpo passaria uma nova vida em uma estranha cidade do interior.

title.en: My Roommate Isn't From This World

altTitles.ja: 同居人がこの世のモンじゃない 連載版

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ga Konoyo no Mon janai Rensai-ban

altTitles.en: My Roommate Isn't Of This World - Serialized Version

altTitles.ru: Мой сосед по комнате не из этого мира

altTitles.zh: 同居人不是这个世界的东西

altTitles.es-la: Mi compañera de cuarto no es de este mundo (Serialización)

description.en:
The young man's new apartment is haunted, but as it turns out, even the dead have their own personal shortcomings… issues of the flesh included.    
For the dead have lingering desires, and are more susceptible to the world of the living than what one may think. There's anger, there's hate, there's curiosity… and there's love too.    
Here he finds a ghastly girl who observes him quietly, certainly desiring *something*…  
(No wonder the rent is cheap!)

Note: this is the serialized version of the Pixiv webcomic.
description.ja: 念願の一人暮らし。快適なオーディオライフ（アダルト）を満喫できる喜びに浸るのもつかの間・・・その部屋には「何か」がいた。SNS累計250万いいねを達成したトキメキ系ホラー、商業進出!!!
description.es-la: ¡Serialización del manga publicado en twitter! Un joven universitario en su deseo de buscar privacidad, se alojara en un apartamento barato y cercano a su universidad. Pronto el protagonista descubrirá la razón del precio, pues parece que él no es la única persona viviendo allí. Una pequeña fantasma estará observando cada una de sus acciones, descubriendo así algo intimo sobre el protagonista.

Majo to Youhei

altTitles.en: WITCH AND MERCENARY

description.en:
Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. “I want you to protect me,” she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
Character Design: [Kanase Bench](https://mangadex.org/author/58a70142-dece-49d1-86b3-e19aa9afadf9)
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10570/episode/350366)

description.fr: Zig, un mercenaire grand et large d'épaules, participe à une chasse aux sorcières. Après un duel acharné avec la sorcière redoutable, il découvre son désir. "Je veux que tu me protèges," demande-t-elle, fatiguée que sa vie soit prise à la légère. Cherchant un endroit pour survivre, la sorcière et le mercenaire tournent leurs regards vers un continent inconnu !
description.es-la: Zig, un mercenario alto y de anchos hombros, participa en una caza de brujas. Tras un feroz duelo con la mortífera bruja, se entera de su deseo. "Quiero que me protejas", le pide ella, cansada de que trivialicen su vida. En busca de un lugar donde sobrevivir, la bruja y el mercenario ponen sus miras en un continente desconocido.

title.en: Turning the Mad Dog Into a Genteel Lord

altTitles.ja-ro: Turning a Crazy Dog Into a Young Master

altTitles.ja: 狂犬な彼を貴公子に変えてみせます!

description.en: Diarin, a priestess without any noteworthy family background or connections, always gets the toughest assignments. So when her boss tells her to help Ceres, a war hero, reintegrate into society, she decides to stop being a pushover and get as much as she can out of it, including a juicy promotion. But upon reaching Ceres' manor, she’s greeted by a growling hound instead of a human. Tasked with the impossible job of turning the mad dog into a proper gentleman, she dedicates herself to caring for him. But his unexpected obsession with her was never part of her plan.

title.en: How Could You Repay the Kindness I Raised You With Obsession?

altTitles.en: Do You Repay the Kindness I Raised You With Your Obsession?

description.en:
I transmigrated into the body of an evil witch in a fairytale.
While I was drowning in loneliness, hated by everyone, I happened to pick up and raise a pair of siblings who were eating my candy house...

"Hazel the Witch, you're sentenced to execution for kidnapping!"

Who would have known that I'd be falsely accused of kidnapping the Grand Duke's younger siblings!
Thankfully, before she knew it, Hazel became a nanny in the Grand Duchy with the help of the children.

However, her employer once said...
"A Grand Duke doesn't marry witches. Nor nannies, of course."
and gulped down kimchi soup.

I don't have no intention of getting marrying either, you know? Especially not to you, your Grace!
I'll just raise the kids and then quit!

altTitles.ja: いとこのこ

altTitles.ja-ro: Itokonoko

altTitles.en: My Cousin
My Young Cousin

description.en:
His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! He’s being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and can’t show her the dignity befitting his older age! On top of that, whether intentional or not, he’s getting flustered by Sou’s inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldn’t take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a “cousin” like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on!
description.ja:
友達以上恋人未満な従妹が距離が近すぎて死ぬほど可愛い!!!!?

夏休みの間、叔父の家で過ごすことになった少年・望。山と田んぼが多い田舎で困惑するも、それ以上彼にはある悩みがあった。その原因は「従妹」の爽!! 褐色元気っ娘の彼女に毎回からかわれては年上の威厳を見せられないでいた！ しかも、天然なのか意図的なのか分からない爽の誘ってくるような仕草にドキッとする始末。いつしか、望は彼女のことが目を離せず……!!? こんな「従妹」がいてくれたら理性が持たない!?
description.pt-br:
Seu primo mais que amigo, menos que amante é tão fofo que poderia morrer!!!!?

Nozomu é um garoto que está na casa do tio nas férias de verão. No campo, onde não há lojas de conveniência, nem mesmo ônibus, o garoto tem um problema. Esse problema é seu primo mais novo, Sou! Ele está sendo levado por essa garota bronzeada e cheia de energia dia após dia e não consegue mostrar a ela a dignidade condizente com sua idade avançada!

Além disso, intencionalmente ou não, ele está ficando nervoso com o comportamento convidativo de Sou. Eventualmente, Nozomu não conseguia tirar os olhos de Sou e estava caindo cada vez mais sob seu feitiço...!!? Com ​​uma "prima" como essa, sua razão está tendo dificuldade em se segurar!

Esta é uma comédia romântica com um cara que está afundando com todas as provocações de sua prima bronzeada!

description.en:
A collection of short stories:  
  
1. Oral Cavity Infectious Syndrome  
On the surreal premise that women's mouths take the often weird shape of their partner's penis, Yoriko starts an investigation to discover with whom her boyfriend is cheating.  
  
2. Local Tourist Information  
A guide to an extraterritorial region of Japan.  
  
3. Back Streets in Front of the Station  
A girl goes crazy about reverse sides of different things, including streets, cars, and animals.  
  
4. Genesis  
Kago Shintarou's rendition of the Book of Genesis.  
  
5. Superglue  
What happens when you step on something so disgusting that you never want to uncover it?  
  
6. Akutagawa in Front of the Station  
A surreal homage to the writings of Ryunosuke Akutagawa.  
  
7. When All's Said and Done - also included in Hell Season  
A gruesome tale of hardened faeces, and a limbless girl.  
  
8. Multiplication  
Comic panels are multiplying and create opposing clans.  
  
9. Abstraction  
A two dimensional comic about young lovers turns 3D causing the characters' bodies to deform.  
  
10. Blow-Up  
What happens when every comic page features exponentionally more panels than the previous one?  
  
11. No Need for Caution  
The action of the comic happens outside of the panels–literally–in the white space.  
  
12. The Memories of Others  
Everyone's memories become visible via floating comic book panels.  
  
13. Lord of the Ring  
An incompetent sumo wrestler uses the powers of a forbidden pair of pants to overcome and shame his competition, until one day someone rises to attempt to crush him and take the pants for himself.  
  
14. Spinning Thoughts  
Wearing urinary calculi is the latest fashion trend.

description.en: After a life tangled with pickpockets, Sasha discovers she might be a "princess"!? Selling a necklace by mistake leads her all the way to the royal palace. Quick-witted and bold, Sasha, the street-savvy princess, and Rascan, the cold-hearted duke and her fiancée who silently stands by her side, embark on a secret romance!

White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger, the shrimp.

It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami, the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!

description.en: A manga set in the NIKKE universe, this story takes place 100 years before the game story. The protagonist, Claude, is the commander of an all mass-produced NIKKE squad who sees them as more than easily replaced tools of war and tries to protect them and fight for their rights.

description.en:
The boy sitting next to me has ear piercings...?!

Urai, is a real mystery. The unexpected words and actions of the mysterious boy, Urai, will make you fainter in agony, you can't take your eyes off the gap between the quiet-looking boy!

It's the beginning of a sparkling and exciting school life!

altTitles.ja: はぴはぴあ！

description.en: Yuki Iwatsuki is a transfer student, today is her first day at her new school. There seems to be some kind of trauma, her classmates “Koneko,” a high-tension girl, and “Akizora Hako,” a box-head girl, are very interested in Yuki! Will she get along with everyone?

altTitles.en: The Resetting Lady
Reset Lady
The Crimson Lady

description.en:
I entered the world of a novel suddenly. I thought that I could return to reality by falling in love, but death was what awaited me in the end. Defenestration, strangulation, poisoning, drowning, and burning to death... Even after dying a hundred times and returning, the novel still doesn't end...

Karen Haier, who greets her 117th birthday trapped within a novel, now decides to become a murderer.
description.fr:
Elle s’est réveillée dans un roman.
Si elle arrive à trouver le véritable amour, alors elle pourra avoir sa fin heureuse.
Cependant, après la fin de l’histoire, ce qui l’a accueillie, c’est la mort.
Et lorsqu’elle a rouvert les yeux, elle était revenue au début de l’histoire.
Elle est tombée amoureuse encore une fois, mais la fin qui l’attendait, était toujours la mort.
Poison… strangulation… maladie… chute… renversée… immolée… affamée à en mourir…
Alors qu’elle fêtait son 117e anniversaire, Carynne Hare décida de devenir une meurtrière.
description.uk:
Карен потрапила в книгу і подолала всі незгоди, зустріла своє кохання. Розплющивши очі, дівчина опинилася на початку свого шляху - в саду, де завжди йшов дощ. Одного разу Карен спало на думку: найсильніше людей турбує не кохання, а смерть. Її охопило хвилювання. Почуття набридли і у свій 117-й День народження вона вирішила стати вбивцею.

Увага! Тайтл 16+.  Ми не несемо відповідальність за ваш емоційний стан. Присутні удушення, відруб голів і море крові, різні.
description.pt-br:
Fui reencarnada para um livro. Se eu encontrasse meu verdadeiro amor, minha vida teria um final feliz. No entanto, quando a história chegou ao fim, o que me cumprimentou foi a morte.

Quando ela abriu os olhos, ela se viu no início de tudo. Ela decidiu se apaixonar de novo. Envenenamento, estrangulamento, queda, doença, morte por esmagamento, morte por queda, morte de… Depois de comemorar seu aniversário de 124 anos, Karen Haier decidiu se tornar uma assassina.

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-shall-master-this-family), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9247)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

---

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A3%BC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2473), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56566288)

เมื่อเธอมาเกิดใหม่ในร่างของฟีเรนเทีย ลอมบาร์เดีย บุตรีแห่งตระกูลลอมบาร์เดีย หลังปู่ของเธอเสียไปเธอก็ถูกไล่ออกจากตระกูลและเพียงไม่นานตระกูลได้ล่มสลาย ฟีเรนเทียประสบอุบัติเหตุเสียชีวิตอีกครั้ง และย้อนกลับมาตอนอายุ 7 ขวบ ฟีเรนเทียที่ล่วงรู้อนาคตที่กำลังจะเกิดขึ้นทุกอย่างจึงพยายามแก้ไขทุกอย่างให้ดีขึ้น และมุ่งสู่เส้นทางการขึ้นเป็นผู้นำตระกูล...

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

---

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

意外穿成为了帝国最声名鼎盛的第一家族的私生女。虽然蒂亚头脑出众，也积累了大量的实战经验，但最终在爷爷去世后被叔叔扫地出门，而无能的叔叔很快便败光了家族的产业…… 意外死亡后，又一次重新回了小时候——这一世，蒂亚决定成为家主，重新让家族站上帝国巅峰！

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

---

description.en:
Following the spirit of the origins of our popular big-breasted girls of Himura Kiseki-sensei, presenting a special Blue Edition of the weekly chapters of Yanmaga magazine's serialization "Getsuyoubi no Tawawa"!

---

Be sure to check out the published volumes released in Blue format in the Retail section, and the official English licensing by Denpa US (also in Blue)!

Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)

description.ar: في المستقبل البعيد ، يولد شكل جديد من أشكال الحياة يسمى Houseki (الجواهر). يجب على الجواهر الـ 28  القتال ضد القمريين الذين يرغبون في مهاجمتهم وتحويلهم إلى زينة ، وبالتالي يتم تعيين كل جوهرة دور مثل مقاتل أو مسعف. على الرغم من أنهم يأملون في محاربة القمريين ، إلا أن فوس  عبارة عن جوهرة لم يتم منحها أي مهمة حتى يطلب منه المعلم الجواهر كونغو كتابة موسوعة.
description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called The Lustrous are born. The 28 Lustrous must fight against the Lunarians who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each Lustrous is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the Lunarians, Phos is a Lustrous who is given no assignment until the Lustrous' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.
description.ru: Далёкое будущее. После серии катаклизмов Земля окружена шестью лунами и почти полностью покрыта океаном. На крохотном островке суши обитают 28 представителей новой расы - самоцветов. Но и они вынуждены непрерывно бороться за существование с обитателями лун. Это история сильных, хрупких и красивых созданий.
description.uk: У далекому майбутньому народжується нова форма життя, яку називають самоцвітами. 28 самоцвітів повинні боротися проти лунаріанців, які хочуть напасти на них і перетворити на прикраси, тому кожному самоцвіту призначена роль бійця або медика. Фос - одна з самоцвітів, яка сподівається боротися з лунаріанцями, але їй не дають жодних завдань, доки майстер самоцвітів Адамантін не просить її написати енциклопедію.

description.en:
A salary man is quite depressed, especially on Mondays. At his lowest point a well-endowed High-School girl calling herself Ai-chan stumbles breast-first into his face. The concussion she gave him served as the start of their relationship.  
  
**Notes**:
 - This page refers to the Twitter manga's official serialization, which began in Weekly Young Magazine on November 16, 2020.
 - For the separate Blue Edition for the serialization, click [here](https://mangadex.org/title/f5818aee-080b-42b5-b717-b1dae81f049c/getsuyoubi-no-tawawa-blue)
description.fr: Un employé de bureau est déprimé, surtout les lundis. Au bout du rouleau, une lycéenne bien fournie qui se fait appeler Ai-chan lui tombe dessus, poitrine la première. La blessure qu’elle lui a infligée, marque le début de leur relation.
description.ja: 読めばアナタも元気になれる！ 月曜日の憂鬱なんて吹っ飛ばす！ たわわな女の子たちの日常コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Um assalariado fica bastante deprimido, principalmente às segundas-feiras. Em seu ponto mais baixo, uma garota bem dotada do colégio que se autodenomina Ai-chan tropeça no rosto dele. A concussão que ela deu a ele serviu como o início de seu relacionamento. 

*Esta página refere-se à serialização oficial do mangá do Twitter, que começou na Weekly Young Magazine em 16 de novembro de 2020.*

Hotchpotch Punch

description.en:
She was destroying people… in her mind.

Kiho Ishiguro is a high school girl who's an honor student at school, and devotes herself to her disabled mother at home. She is quiet and gentle, but deep down inside she has always had the urge to "hit someone." As her feelings gets stronger day by day, Kiho encounters a street criminal. She snaps and unleashes her rage on the bad guy without restraint…? Here comes the JK who will revolutionize the world of women's MMA!
description.es: Kuroishi Kiho, en la escuela es una estudiante ejemplar, en casa es una buena hija que ayuda a su madre con sus problemas en las piernas... pero en sus fantasías, es alguien que hace pedazos a la gente. Aunque parece tranquila y gentil, en lo más profundo de su corazón existe un impulso que la hace querer "golpear a otros". Desbordada por las fantasías que no la dejan en paz, decide confrontar a un violador, ¿Será capaz de liberar y apaciguar sus emociones reprimidas con este criminal? ¡Entra en escena la estudiante de preparatoria que podría revolucionar las artes marciales de mujeres!

description.en:
Suddenly a high school student Subaru Natsuki has been summoned to another world on the way back from the convenience store. With the biggest crisis of his life being summoned to another world and no sign of the one who summoned him things become worse when he is attacked. But when he is saved by a mysterious silver-haired girl with a fairy cat, Subaru co-operates with the girl to return the favor. When they finally manage to get a clue Subaru and the girl are attacked and killed by someone. Subaru then awakens in the place he was summoned and notices the ability he gained "Returns by Death" a helpless boy that only has the ability to rewind time by dying. And beyond the despair can he save the girl from the fate of death!

---
[Original Web Novel](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n2267be) (Raw)
description.ru: Когда ученик старшей школы, Нацуки Субару, возвращается из магазина, с ним случается странная неожиданность: он переносится в другой мир. Почти сразу парень попадает в неприятности, но спасение приходит в лице сребовласой девушки, которая поначалу и помогать-то не собиралась даже. В благодарность за помощь наш герой, конечно же, вызывается помочь незнакомке. Но вот незадача. Как только им удается заполучить подсказку, их…убивают. Как же обмануть смерть и спасти невинную жизнь?
description.pt-br: De repente, Subaru Natsuki, um estudante do ensino médio, foi convocado para um outro mundo no caminho de volta da loja de conveniência. Com a maior crise de sua vida ocorrendo e nenhum sinal de quem o convocou as coisas pioram ao ser atacado. Mas quando é salvo por uma garota de cabelos prateados misteriosa com um gato fada, Subaru coopera com a menina para retribuir o favor. Quando eles finalmente conseguem obter uma pista, Subaru e a menina são atacados e mortos. Subaru então desperta no lugar que ele foi convocado e percebe a capacidade que ele ganhou: “Retorno da morte”. Um menino indefeso que só tem a capacidade de voltar no tempo morrendo. E, além do desespero, ele pode salvar a menina da morte!

description.en: Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

description.en:
"Won't you become a Goblin's bride?"   
  
In Yang-an, the capital of the Shun Dynasty Empire, there are rumors of a Goddess who sings a song that grants your wishes in your dreams if you visit a certain pharmacy. To confirm this, Sa Heonyoung, who disguises his status as a member of the royal family, goes to find the Goddess of the rumors. After listening to her song, he yearns for her, as if he is suffering from an illness…  
  
A man who must kill his own identity under a goblin's mask; and a woman who has no name or a lover, and lives only for the revenge in her mother's will. A mournful love story between a man and a woman who are the only ones who can fully understand each other. 

---

description.ko:
"도깨비의 신부가 되지 않겠습니까?“

순나라의 황도 양안. 어느 약방에 찾아가면 신녀가 꿈속에서 소원을 이뤄 주는 노래를 불러 준다는 소문이 파다하다. 이를 검증하기 위해 신분을 속인 채 다른 이들 틈에 섞여 신녀를 찾아간 친왕, 사헌영. 그는 신녀의 노래를 듣고 난 뒤, 병을 앓듯 그녀를 찾게 되는데….

도깨비 가면을 쓴 채 자신을 죽이고 살아가야만 하는 남자. 외로운 산 속에서 하루 하루 죽음만을 기다리며 살아가는 이름 없는 여자. 온전히 자신을 알아주는 건 서로밖에 없는 남녀의 애절한 사랑 이야기.

altTitles.en: His Majesty's Secret Heroine

altTitles.ja: 蓮禄昕～宿命の華～

altTitles.es-la: La heroína oculta de su Majestad

description.en:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)
description.es-la: Yeon Lokheun es una niña que crece viviendo como un niño aprendiendo artes marciales y espirituales. Se dirige al palacio para limpiar el nombre de su padre, un criminal buscado, donde conoce al joven emperador Garyun. Él promete salvar la vida de su padre a cambio de sus servicios de por vida. Después de ganarse la confianza de Garyun, viaja por el mundo resolviendo problemas sobrenaturales que surgen en lugar del Emperador. ¿Pero cuánto tiempo puede continuar esta vida sin que los demás descubran que en realidad es una mujer?

title.en: Kanojo ni Uwaki Sareteita Ore ga, Koakuma na Kouhai ni Natsukareteimasu

altTitles.ja: カノジョに浮気されていた俺が、小悪魔な後輩に懐かれています

altTitles.en: I Was Cheated On by My Girlfriend, but My Devilish Junior Now Yearns for Me
My Coquettish Junior Attaches Herself to Me!

altTitles.ru: Девушка изменила мне с другим, и теперь моя дьяволёнок-кохай пристаёт ко мне

description.en:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less! Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
description.ja: クリスマス直前に彼女に浮気された大学二年・羽瀬川悠太。 意気消沈する彼の前に、サンタの格好をした美少女後輩・志乃原真由が現れる！ グイグイ来る彼女は、次第に家にまで上がり込むようになり…！？
description.ru: Однажды за несколько дней до Рождества, молодой Хасегава Юта тяжело расстался со своей бывшей девушкой, которая ему изменила. После повседневного диалога со своей давней подругой Мино Аякой, Юта встретил красивую во всех смысла слова девушку по имени Маю Шиномия, одетую в костюм Санты. Неужели внезапная встреча с кокетливой красоткой станет рождественским подарком для Юты?
description.pt-br:
Época Natalina.

Hasegawa Yuuta se viu solteiro após terminar o namoro no mês passado, quando sua namorada o traiu. E faltavam apenas alguns dias para o Natal! Depois de uma conversa normal com sua amiga Mino Ayaka, Yuuta conheceu uma linda garota vestida de Papai Noel - em uma rua cheia de casais!

Seu nome era Shinohara Mayu. Será que esse encontro com Shinohara será o presente de Natal para Yuuta?

altTitles.ja: 俺は全てを【パリイ】する　～逆勘違いの世界最強は冒険者の夢をみる～

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore ha Subete wo “Parry” Suru ~Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyou wa Boukensha ni Naritai~

altTitles.en: I Parry Everything: What Do You Mean I’m the Strongest? I’m Not Even an Adventurer Yet!
I Parry All ~With A Reverse Misunderstanding, The World's Strongest Dreams Of Being An Adventurer~

altTitles.uk: Я "парирую" всё: Сильнейший человек в мире хочет стать авантюристом
Я парировал все время, чтобы стать сильнейшим авантюристом

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đỡ Hết Mọi Thứ: Bạn bảo tôi là người mạnh nhất? Tôi còn chưa được làm mạo hiểm gia đâu đấy!

altTitles.ja: I WILL “PARRY” ALL - The world's strongest man dreams of an adventurer -

description.en:
Ever since he was a young boy, Noor has wanted to be like the adventurers in his father’s stories — dragonslayers, cursebreakers, heroes who always save the day. But as everyone knows, to be an adventurer, you’ve gotta have the right skills! 

Unfortunately for Noor, his [Parry] is bottom-of-the-barrel useless, his prospects are nonexistent, and everybody he knows is telling him to throw in the towel. Faced with this harsh reality, he figures there’s only one thing to do: make up for it with effort! An intense, solitary training regimen ought to do it. If one year won’t cut it, he’ll train for five! If not five, ten! 

Now facing the tail end of his twenties with no new skills to show for his labors, Noor sets out to become an adventurer anyway, determined to try one last time to make his dream come true. He might be clueless when it comes to adventuring, but he’s no stranger to hard work! 

Now, if only he can figure out why everyone keeps looking at him like that...
 
---
 
Original Web Novel: <https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6537fu/>
description.vi:
Kể từ khi còn nhỏ, Noor luôn muốn sắm vai trở thành mạo hiểm gia trong những câu chuyện của cha cậu - dũng sĩ diệt rồng, pháp sư quyền năng, những vị anh hùng luôn dang tay giúp đỡ những người yếu thế. Nhưng để trở thành một mạo hiểm gia thực thụ là cả một quá trình đổ mồ hôi sôi nước mắt.

Không may cho Noor, chiêu [Đỡ] của cậu lại phế toàn tập, thất bại nối tiếp thất bại, mọi người ai ai cũng khuyên cậu từ bỏ. Đối mặt với thực tại tàn khốc này, Noor biết chỉ còn một cách duy nhất để khẳng định bản thân: Chính là luyện tập thật khắc nghiệt! Một khóa huấn luyện đơn độc, khốc liệt chắc chắn sẽ hiệu quả. Nếu một năm không thành, thì phải luyện thêm năm năm. Nếu năm năm vẫn không thạo, phải tập thêm mười năm!

Hai mươi cái xuân xanh sắp trôi qua, trong khi bạn bè đồng trang lứa đã thành đạt, mình cậu vẫn giậm chân tại chỗ. Tuy vậy, giấc mơ trở thành mạo hiểm gia trong cậu vẫn rực cháy, Noor quyết tâm một lần cuối cùng để thực hiện khát khao đó. Dẫu không hiểu rõ việc phiêu lưu nghĩa là gì, nhưng cần cù bù siêng năng, chỉ cần cố gắng là được!

Hãy cùng theo dõi bước chân từ chàng mạo hiểm gia trẻ tuổi trở thành người mạnh nhất lục địa...
description.pt-br: Desde que era um menino, Noor queria ser como os aventureiros das histórias de seu pai — matadores de dragões, quebradores de maldições, heróis que sempre salvam o dia. Mas, como todos sabem, para ser um aventureiro, é preciso ter as habilidades certas!Infelizmente para Noor, sua [Parry] é completamente inútil, suas perspectivas são inexistentes, e todos que ele conhece estão dizendo para ele desistir. Diante dessa dura realidade, ele percebe que só há uma coisa a fazer: compensar isso com esforço! Um intenso regime de treinamento solitário deve resolver. Se um ano não for suficiente, ele treinará por cinco! Se não forem cinco, dez!Agora, ao final dos seus vinte e poucos anos, sem novas habilidades para mostrar pelo seu trabalho árduo, Noor decide se tornar um aventureiro mesmo assim, determinado a tentar uma última vez para realizar seu sonho. Ele pode não saber nada sobre aventuras, mas não é estranho ao trabalho duro! Agora, se ele apenas conseguir descobrir por que todos continuam olhando para ele daquele jeito..

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?
